languages.text: {n}Абеляр устало вздыхает.{/n} "Немезит, Ваша Светлость, это народный мститель из легенд пустотников. Каждые несколько лет какой-нибудь смельчак объявляет себя Немезитом. Заканчивают они плохо, как и те, кому хватает ума поверить в их бредни". {n}Сенешаль выразительно смотрит на съежившуюся Нэми.{/n}

{n}Abelard sighs wearily.{/n} "Nemesite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is a folk vigilante from voidsman legends. Every few years, some hothead declares himself Nemesite. They always meet a sticky end, as do those foolish enough to believe in Nemesite's ravings." {n}The Seneschal levels a meaningful look at Nemi, who shrinks away.{/n}

Заканчивают они плохо, как и те, кому хватает ума поверить в их бредни". {n}Сенешаль выразительно смотрит на съежившуюся Нэми.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard suspira con desaliento.{/n} «Mil{mf|ord|ady}, Nemesito es un justiciero del folklore de los infantes del vacío. Cada pocos años, algún cabeza hueca se hace llamar Nemesitio. Todos suelen acabar mal, al igual que aquellos lo bastante necios como para creerse esas leyendas». {n}El Senescal lanza una mirada llena de intención a Nemi, que se encoge un poco.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs wearily.{/n} "Nemesite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is a folk vigilante from voidsman legends. Every few years, some hothead declares himself Nemesite. They always meet a sticky end, as do those foolish enough to believe in Nemesite's ravings." {n}The Seneschal levels a meaningful look at Nemi, who shrinks away.{/n}

Cada pocos años, algún cabeza hueca se hace llamar Nemesitio. Todos suelen acabar mal, al igual que aquellos lo bastante necios como para creerse esas leyendas». {n}El Senescal lanza una mirada llena de intención a Nemi, que se encoge un poco.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは疲れたようにため息をついた。{/n}「陛下、ネメサイトはヴォイズマンの伝説に登場する民間の自警団です。数年に一度、ネメサイトを名乗る者が現れ、ネメサイトの戯言を信じる愚かな者たちと同様、彼らはいつも厄介な結末を迎えます」{n}家令長は意味ありげな視線をネミに向けるが、ネミは身を縮めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs wearily.{/n} "Nemesite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is a folk vigilante from voidsman legends. Every few years, some hothead declares himself Nemesite. They always meet a sticky end, as do those foolish enough to believe in Nemesite's ravings." {n}The Seneschal levels a meaningful look at Nemi, who shrinks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは疲れたようにため息をついた。{/n}「陛下、ネメサイトはヴォイズマンの伝説に登場する民間の自警団です。数年に一度、ネメサイトを名乗る者が現れ、ネメサイトの戯言を信じる愚かな者たちと同様、彼らはいつも厄介な結末を迎えます」{n}家令長は意味ありげな視線をネミに向けるが、ネミは身を縮めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德疲惫地叹了口气。{/n}“大人，涅墨斯特是船员传说里的人物，是个行侠仗义的家伙。每隔几年，就会有某个不长脑子的家伙宣称自己就是涅墨斯特本人。这些人往往都会落得相当悲惨的下场，而那些听信涅墨斯特荒诞谣言的蠢货，往往也会落得同样的下场。”{n}阿贝拉德意味深长地看了涅米一眼，涅米吓得退了一步。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs wearily.{/n} "Nemesite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is a folk vigilante from voidsman legends. Every few years, some hothead declares himself Nemesite. They always meet a sticky end, as do those foolish enough to believe in Nemesite's ravings." {n}The Seneschal levels a meaningful look at Nemi, who shrinks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德疲惫地叹了口气。{/n}“大人，涅墨斯特是船员传说里的人物，是个行侠仗义的家伙。每隔几年，就会有某个不长脑子的家伙宣称自己就是涅墨斯特本人。这些人往往都会落得相当悲惨的下场，而那些听信涅墨斯特荒诞谣言的蠢货，往往也会落得同样的下场。”{n}阿贝拉德意味深长地看了涅米一眼，涅米吓得退了一步。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard seufzt müde.{/n} "Nemesit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ist ein Produkt von Raumfahrerlegenden. Alle paar Jahre erklärt sich irgendein Heißsporn zum Nemesit. Sie enden stets kläglich, genau wie die Narren, die an ihr wirres Gerede glauben." {n}Der Truchsess wirft Nemi einen bedeutungsvollen Blick zu, die vor ihm zurückweicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs wearily.{/n} "Nemesite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is a folk vigilante from voidsman legends. Every few years, some hothead declares himself Nemesite. They always meet a sticky end, as do those foolish enough to believe in Nemesite's ravings." {n}The Seneschal levels a meaningful look at Nemi, who shrinks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard seufzt müde.{/n} "Nemesit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ist ein Produkt von Raumfahrerlegenden. Alle paar Jahre erklärt sich irgendein Heißsporn zum Nemesit. Sie enden stets kläglich, genau wie die Narren, die an ihr wirres Gerede glauben." {n}Der Truchsess wirft Nemi einen bedeutungsvollen Blick zu, die vor ihm zurückweicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abélard laisse échapper un soupir empreint de lassitude.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, Némésite est un justicier issu du folklore des cosmomarins. Il arrive régulièrement que l'une ou l'autre tête brûlée s'autoproclame Némésite. Mais ces rebelles rencontrent toujours une fin prématurée, de même que tous ceux qui ont été assez fous pour croire à leurs divagations. » {n}Le sénéchal tourne ostensiblement le regard vers Nemi, qui semble comme se ratatiner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs wearily.{/n} "Nemesite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is a folk vigilante from voidsman legends. Every few years, some hothead declares himself Nemesite. They always meet a sticky end, as do those foolish enough to believe in Nemesite's ravings." {n}The Seneschal levels a meaningful look at Nemi, who shrinks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard laisse échapper un soupir empreint de lassitude.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, Némésite est un justicier issu du folklore des cosmomarins. Il arrive régulièrement que l'une ou l'autre tête brûlée s'autoproclame Némésite. Mais ces rebelles rencontrent toujours une fin prématurée, de même que tous ceux qui ont été assez fous pour croire à leurs divagations. » {n}Le sénéchal tourne ostensiblement le regard vers Nemi, qui semble comme se ratatiner.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard, bitkin bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Nemezit, uçsuz eri efsanelerinde geçen sözüm ona bir halk kahramanıdır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Birkaç yılda bir fevri bir tip çıkıp kendini Nemezit ilan eder. Bu şahısları her daim tatsız bir son bekler. Nemezit'in deliliklerine inanacak kadar ahmak olanları da..." {n}Seneşal, ezilip büzülen Nemi'ye manidar bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs wearily.{/n} "Nemesite, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is a folk vigilante from voidsman legends. Every few years, some hothead declares himself Nemesite. They always meet a sticky end, as do those foolish enough to believe in Nemesite's ravings." {n}The Seneschal levels a meaningful look at Nemi, who shrinks away.{/n}
